sentences.sContent: This month alone, my wife and I spent $600 on one Labrador retriever with a bladder infection who needed some kidney tests and $300 on the other one for an injured paw.
sentences.sContent_eng: This month alone, my wife and I spent $600 on one Labrador retriever with a bladder infection who needed some kidney tests and $300 on the other one for an injured paw.
sentences.sCn: 仅这个月，我和我妻子就为一患膀胱感染而需要肾测试的拉布拉多犬花费了600美元，同时为另外一只爪子受伤的拉布拉多犬支付了300美元。
